predict_diagnosis:
1. POEMS Syndrome
2. Neonatal Marfan syndrome
3. Familial Mediterranean Fever (FMF)
4. Hypercalcemic Postbypartum syndrome
5. Syndrome of Inappropriate Antidiuretic Hormone (SIADH)
6. Cardiac amyloidosis
7. Progressive Systemic Sclerosis (PSS)
8. Mixed Connective Tissue Disease (MCTD)
9. Secondary hypertension due to renal artery stenosis
10. Chronic kidney disease (CKD) with secondary mineral and bone disorder
